subject: Education
title: Assessment OF Learning vs. FOR Learning
description: A fast breakdown of Assessment OF Learning vs. FOR Learning for builders.

hook.text: A doctor who only diagnoses at the funeral isn't very useful. Neither is a test after the course ends.

buildup.text: Assessment OF learning (summative) judges final performance. Assessment FOR learning (formative) guides it.

discovery.text: Formative assessmentâ€”checking understanding during learningâ€”improves outcomes far more than final exams.

twist.text: Most schools spend 90% of assessment effort on grading, not on guiding learning.

climax.text: When assessment shifts from judgment to guidance, students stop fearing it and start using it.

punchline.text: The best assessment happens before the grade, not after.

quiz.question: What is the key difference between assessment OF learning and FOR learning?
options: Assessment FOR learning guides improvement during learning; OF learning judges final outcomes
Assessment OF learning is always written; FOR learning is always oral
They are identical concepts with different names
